name: Sadness is a Teenage Girl
description:
According to CDC data, nearly 3 in 5 (57%) U.S. teen girls feel sad or hopeless. This is the highest it's been and there are a lot of factors that contribute to this, but social media is one of the biggest stressors. This game explores the narrative of what an average girl thinks throughout a normal day. 

To read more about this issue, check out this article.

This game is in progress.

Created by Hannah Hughes (portfolio)
